favourite.article: My heart, dear Lord, I yield anew To only love, lay hold on You. Lord, keep me faithful till You come
Lord, my desp'rate cry now heed - Regain my heart!

O Lord, You know what’s in my heart, Desires concealed in my inward parts; Though “I am Yours” my mouth’s confessed, By many loves my heart’s possessed. O Lord, my desp’rate cry now heed— Regain my heart! Your help I need! O’erturn, expose what weighs me down.
Oh Lord You know what's in my heart--YOUR Hearts desire-the Church! I am Yours a God man indeed Your life and nature I too share My heart dear Lord I yield anew!!!
